container.title: Assessing one's own skills can sometimes be a delicate exercise, so why not do it with a touch of humor? Here's my personal version :
container.subtitle: You can change the proposed colors in the color palette by clicking on them. Then click on the logo of your choice to discover the skills I associate with each level!

firstScale.title: Good coder
firstScale.description: You probably know the difference between a good coder and a bad coder...

secondScale.title: Good coder with a cup of coffee
secondScale.description: Because coffee is the ultimate fuel for any passionate programmer !

thirdScale.title: Good coder with a cup of coffee and a hoodie
thirdScale.description: Because a casual style and technical skills go hand in hand.
